goal_meta_link_text: United Nations Sustainable Development Goals Metadata (PDF 382 KB)
graph_title: Proporción de jóvenes (entre 15 y 24 años) que no cursan estudios, no están empleados ni reciben capacitación
indicator_definition: This proportion of youth (aged 15-24 years) not in education, employment or training, also known as "the NEET rate", conveys the number of young persons not in education, employment or training as a percentage of the total youth population.
indicator_name: Proporción de jóvenes (entre 15 y 24 años) que no cursan estudios, no están empleados ni reciben capacitación
target_name: De aquí a 2020, reducir considerablemente la proporción de jóvenes que no están empleados y no cursan estudios ni reciben capacitación
